00008 #include "pgpmac.h"
00009 
00010 static pthread_t        lslogging_thread;
00011 static pthread_mutex_t lslogging_mutex;
00012 static pthread_cond_t  lslogging_cond;
00013 
00014 
00015 #define LSLOGGING_FILE_NAME "/tmp/pgpmac.log"
00016 static FILE *lslogging_file;
00017 
00018 #define LSLOGGING_MSG_LENGTH 256
00019 typedef struct lslogging_queue_struct {
00020   struct timespec ltime;                        
00021   char lmsg[LSLOGGING_MSG_LENGTH];      
00022 } lslogging_queue_t;
00023 
00024 #define LSLOGGING_QUEUE_LENGTH 256
00025 static lslogging_queue_t lslogging_queue[LSLOGGING_QUEUE_LENGTH];
00026 
00027 static unsigned int lslogging_on = 0;   
00028 static unsigned int lslogging_off= 0;   
00029 
00030 void lslogging_init() {
00031   pthread_mutex_init( &lslogging_mutex, NULL);
00032   pthread_cond_init(  &lslogging_cond, NULL);
00033 
00034   lslogging_file = fopen( LSLOGGING_FILE_NAME, "w");
00035 }
00036 
00037 void lslogging_log_message( char *fmt, ...) {
00038   char msg[LSLOGGING_MSG_LENGTH];
00039   struct timespec theTime;
00040   va_list arg_ptr;
00041 
00042   clock_gettime( CLOCK_REALTIME, &theTime);
00043 
00044   va_start( arg_ptr, fmt);
00045   vsnprintf( msg, sizeof(msg)-1, fmt, arg_ptr);
00046   va_end( arg_ptr);
00047   msg[sizeof(msg)-1]=0;
00048 
00049   pthread_mutex_lock( &lslogging_mutex);
00050   
00051   strncpy( lslogging_queue[lslogging_on].lmsg, msg, LSLOGGING_MSG_LENGTH - 1);
00052   lslogging_queue[lslogging_on].lmsg[LSLOGGING_MSG_LENGTH-1] = 0;
00053   
00054   memcpy( &(lslogging_queue[lslogging_on].ltime), &theTime, sizeof(theTime));
00055 
00056   lslogging_on++;
00057   lslogging_on %= LSLOGGING_QUEUE_LENGTH;
00058 
00059   pthread_cond_signal(  &lslogging_cond);
00060   pthread_mutex_unlock( &lslogging_mutex);
00061   
00062 }
00063 
00064 void *lslogging_worker(
00065                       void *dummy       
00066                       ) {
00067 
00068 
00069   struct tm coarsetime;
00070   char tstr[64];
00071   unsigned int msecs;
00072 
00073   pthread_mutex_lock( &lslogging_mutex);
00074 
00075   while( 1) {
00076     while( lslogging_on == lslogging_off) {
00077       pthread_cond_wait( &lslogging_cond, &lslogging_mutex);
00078     }
00079     
00080     localtime_r( &(lslogging_queue[lslogging_off].ltime.tv_sec), &coarsetime);
00081     strftime( tstr, sizeof(tstr)-1, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", &coarsetime);
00082     tstr[sizeof(tstr)-1] = 0;
00083     msecs = lslogging_queue[lslogging_off].ltime.tv_nsec / 1000000;
00084     fprintf( lslogging_file, "%s.%.03u  %s\n", tstr, msecs, lslogging_queue[lslogging_off].lmsg);
00085     fflush( lslogging_file);
00086 
00087     lslogging_off++;
00088     lslogging_off %= LSLOGGING_QUEUE_LENGTH;
00089   }
00090 }
00091 
00092 void lslogging_run() {
00093   pthread_create( &lslogging_thread, NULL, &lslogging_worker, NULL);
00094   lslogging_log_message( "Start up");
00095 }
